column3: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Social Care
column5: Develop your professional practice to deliver high quality healthcare services across the healthcare sector.Advanced practice is built upon four pillars of practice; clinical practice, facilitating learning, leadership, and evidence, research and development. This course will develop your professional practice in your workplace and the practice of others you work with to provide high quality care.
column7: UK Part time - £915 per 20 credit module  Overseas Part time - £1,610 per 20 credit module
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years (minimum) part time
